book.title: Crit Hit & Run
invariants: No convenient amnesia as a continuity device.

chapters.title: The Tutorial is a Bug, Not a Feature
chapters.goal: Survive the lethal 'Instant-Death' tutorial by discovering a physics glitch.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a confused victim of a forced isekai to a glitched survivor with a unique combat exploit.

bridge.from_prev: Protagonist is pulled from Earth into the 'Criticulous' system.
bridge.to_next: Escaping the tutorial zone with illegal starter gear leads to the first questing hub.

chapters.title: Looting the Unlootable
chapters.goal: Abuse the 'Crit Hit & Run' mechanic to rob a high-level merchant caravan without triggering aggro.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a penniless level-one scrub to a suspiciously well-geared rogue with a bounty on his head.

bridge.from_prev: Arrival in the hub world with glitched stats.
bridge.to_next: The stolen loot contains a quest item that forces the protagonist into a dangerous dungeon.

chapters.title: The Gilded Grind
chapters.goal: Speed-run the 'Vault of Eternal Sighs' using movement exploits to bypass all puzzles.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a petty thief to a major threat to the local power balance as he gains massive XP.

bridge.from_prev: Acquiring the key to the Vault from the stolen caravan loot.
bridge.to_next: The rapid leveling triggers a 'System Integrity Check' and a regional administrator's attention.

chapters.title: Patch Notes from Hell
chapters.goal: Survive a mid-combat 'Hotfix' that disables the protagonist's primary movement exploit.
chapters.stakes_shift: From an unstoppable exploiter back to a vulnerable player who must learn to fight legitimately—or find a new bug.

bridge.from_prev: The System Administrator notices the XP gain and deploys a patch.
bridge.to_next: Stranded in a high-level zone with broken mechanics, the protagonist seeks a 'Debug Room'.

chapters.title: Debugging the Dragon
chapters.goal: Infiltrate a restricted developer zone to manually reset his character's 'Glitched' status.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a crippled player to a 'System-Aware' entity capable of manipulating world-level variables.

bridge.from_prev: Finding the entrance to the hidden administrative layer of the world.
bridge.to_next: Discovering that the regional boss is actually a corrupted admin tool.

chapters.title: Critical Error
chapters.goal: Defeat the Regional Administrator by intentionally crashing the local server instance.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a local nuisance to a world-class anomaly that the System cannot easily delete.

bridge.from_prev: Gaining the ability to force-spawn 'Error' entities.
bridge.to_next: The server crash creates a permanent rift in the game world.

chapters.title: Winner by Technicality
chapters.goal: Claim the 'God-Slayer' loot and escape to the next continent before the world resets.
chapters.stakes_shift: From a mere player to a fugitive 'Admin-Killer' with a target on his back from the game's creators.

bridge.from_prev: The defeat of the Administrator and the resulting loot drop.
bridge.to_next: The journey continues to a new region where the rules are even easier to break.

sections.title: Welcome to the Grind
sections.intent: Introduce the protagonist and the lethal nature of the forced isekai tutorial.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist enters the active tutorial combat zone.

sections.title: The Infinite Death Loop
sections.intent: Establish the 'Instant-Death' mechanic and the protagonist's discovery of a physics exploit.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist successfully triggers the physics glitch for the first time.

sections.title: Breaking the Box
sections.intent: The protagonist uses the glitch to bypass the tutorial boss and loot restricted items.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist exits the tutorial zone with illegal starter gear.

sections.title: The Hub and the Mark
sections.intent: Introduce the world hub and identify a high-value, high-level target.
sections.end_condition: The high-level merchant caravan is identified as the heist target.

sections.title: Crit Hit & Run
sections.intent: Execute the robbery using the protagonist's unique combat exploit.
sections.end_condition: The caravan is successfully looted without triggering standard combat aggro.

sections.title: Wanted: Level One
sections.intent: Deal with the immediate consequences of the heist and the resulting bounty.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist reaches a safe zone with the stolen loot and a bounty on his head.

sections.title: Bypassing the Gatekeepers
sections.intent: Enter the Vault of Eternal Sighs and use movement exploits to skip initial puzzles.
sections.end_condition: The first major mechanical puzzle of the Vault is bypassed.

sections.title: The Speed-run
sections.intent: Navigate the dangerous interior of the vault at high speed using glitches.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist reaches the final vault chamber ahead of the intended timeline.

sections.title: Emptying the Vault
sections.intent: Secure the massive XP gain and the key quest item from the vault core.
sections.end_condition: The Vault is cleared and the protagonist's level spikes significantly.

sections.title: The Unbeatable Mob
sections.intent: The protagonist encounters a high-level ambush that forces reliance on his glitch.
sections.end_condition: The System Hotfix notification appears mid-combat.

sections.title: Standard Combat Sucks
sections.intent: The protagonist must survive a fight after his primary exploit is disabled by the patch.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist survives the initial encounter through desperate, legitimate tactics.

sections.title: Seeking the Source
sections.intent: Realizing he can't survive without his edge, the protagonist looks for a way to the administrative layer.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist resolves to find the hidden Debug Room.

sections.title: The Backdoor Entrance
sections.intent: Find and infiltrate the hidden entrance to the administrative layer.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist successfully enters the Administrative Layer of the world.

sections.title: The Dev Zone
sections.intent: Navigate the surreal environment of the restricted developer zone.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist reaches the central character terminal.

sections.title: Overriding the System
sections.intent: Manually reset the character's status and gain system-level awareness.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist gains 'System-Aware' status and manipulates world variables.

sections.title: The Administrator's Wrath
sections.intent: Confront the Regional Administrator who is attempting to delete the anomaly.
sections.end_condition: The final battle begins within the server room.

sections.title: Stacking the Errors
sections.intent: Intentionally spawn errors and glitches to destabilize the server instance.
sections.end_condition: Local server stability reaches a critical, failing threshold.

sections.title: Hard Reboot
sections.intent: Defeat the Administrator by forcing a crash and surviving the resulting reset.
sections.end_condition: Regional Administrator is defeated as the instance crashes.

sections.title: Looting the Crash
sections.intent: Recover the unique 'God-Slayer' loot from the remains of the Administrator.
sections.end_condition: The God-Slayer loot is claimed and identified.

sections.title: The Last Boat Out
sections.intent: Escape the stabilizing region before the System fully re-asserts control.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist successfully departs the current continent.

sections.title: New Rules, New Bugs
sections.intent: Arrive at a new land with higher stakes and the title of Admin-Killer.
sections.end_condition: Protagonist arrives at the new continent with a target on his back.
